constraints.name: ordering
constraints.description: 序列必须非递减（高度约束）
constraints.formal: A[i] <= A[i+1] for all 0 <= i < n-1

constraints.name: sum_constraint
constraints.description: 选取元素的高度和不超过给定的总高度上限
constraints.formal: sum(A[i]) <= H for all selected i

constraints.name: frequency_bound
constraints.description: 每个高度值出现的次数不超过给定的最大频次
constraints.formal: count(A[i]) <= F for all 0 <= i < n

result.description: 最大化满足条件的子数组和

invariants.name: monotonicity
invariants.description: 双指针左右端点单调前进，区间合法性可单调维护

invariants.name: optimal_substructure
invariants.description: 最优解包含子问题的最优解，满足动态规划的最优子结构性质

invariants.name: interval_additivity
invariants.description: 区间和可通过端点差值计算，前缀和的区间可加性
